name: Japanese Cocktail
description: Let's start the weekend right--with a cocktail recipe from Paul Clarke (The Cocktail Chronicles). Need more than one? Hit up the archives. Cheers! Pioneering 19th century bartender Jerry Thomas is such a towering figure in the cocktail world that over...
recipeIngredient: 1/4 ounce orgeat (a French almond syrup flavored with orange flower water)

recipeInstructions.text: Combine ingredients in a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Twist a large piece of lemon peel over the drink and use as garnish.
